description: Creates and defines the settings for an allow list.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive token that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: The criteria that specify the text or text pattern to ignore. The criteria can be the location and name of an S3 object that lists specific text to ignore (s3WordsList), or a regular expression (regex) that defines a text pattern to ignore. regex (string) --- The regular expression (regex) that defines the text pattern to ignore. The expression can contain as many as 512 characters. s3WordsList (dict) --- The location and name of the S3 object that lists specific text to ignore. The full name of the S3 bucket that contains the object. The full name (key) of the object.

nested_params.name: regex
nested_params.description: The regular expression (regex) that defines the text pattern to ignore. The expression can contain as many as 512 characters.

nested_params.name: s3WordsList
nested_params.description: The location and name of the S3 object that lists specific text to ignore.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: The full name of the S3 bucket that contains the object.

nested_params.name: objectKey
nested_params.description: The full name (key) of the object.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A custom name for the allow list. The name can contain as many as 128 characters.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map of key-value pairs that specifies the tags to associate with the allow list. An allow list can have a maximum of 50 tags. Each tag consists of a tag key and an associated tag value. The maximum length of a tag key is 128 characters. The maximum length of a tag value is 256 characters. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the allow list.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the allow list.
